original: Linde, Per Tohan Ebbe Fredrik, fil. lic., författare, Göteborg, f. 27/9/97 i Krokeks s:n, östergötl. 1., av kyrkoh. Johan Peter L. o. Fredrique Win-berg. — Stud:ex. 13, fil. kand. 18, fil. lic. 28. Speciallär. i elektrokemi v. CTH. Skr.: Bräsch (dikter 24), Brott o. straff (30), Brudsporre (skå-desp. i två akt. 31), Ur den magiska kitteln (32), Senapskornet (skådesp. i fem akt. 34), Dikter III (36), Isljuset (skådesp. i tre akt. 38), (iilgamesj (skådesp. f. musik 46) m. fl.
translated: Linde, Per Tohan Ebbe Fredrik, Ph. Lic., author, Göteborg, b. 27/9/97 in Krokek parish, Östergötland 1st district, son of clergyman Johan Peter L. and Fredrique Winberg. — Secondary school examination 13, Bachelor of Arts 18, Ph. Lic. 28. Special teacher in electrochemistry at CTH. Written works: "Bräsch" (poems 24), "Brott o. straff" (30), "Brudsporre" (play in two acts 31), "Ur den magiska kitteln" (32), "Senapskornet" (play in five acts 34), "Dikter III" (36), "Isljuset" (play in three acts 38), "(iilgamesj" (musical play 46), and others. Note that "\d\d m. partner's name" indicates marriage in the year 19xx.
